page.title: 17Tourism - Powburn Area
page.content:
Our area is becoming increasingly popular with tourists. There is a large caravan site run by the local council near Branton. It is open from Easter until October and is specially for touring caravans.' Bed and breakfast' is also offered during the Summer months at several farmhouses.
There are, at present, seven cottages in our area which are being used as holiday homes. In view of the fact that the area is fairly sparsely populated, this is quite a high proportion.
People like to come here for holidays because there are lots of good walks, the countryside is quiet and peaceful and they get plenty of fresh air.
